metadata.title: CVE-2021-47470 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:mm, slub: fix potential use-after-free in slab_debugfs_fopsWhen sysfs_slab_add failed, we shouldn't call debugfs_slab_add() for sbecause s will be freed soon.  And slab_debugfs_fops will use s laterleading to a use-after-free.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
